instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-2330: What is 820-2330? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2330</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Noise on external monitor only
threads.message:
[media=youtube]fUwMzKDM308[/media]


another <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2330</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> board

This board never been liquid damage. board looks nice and clean everywhere.

the filters around the DP connector has good continuity.  what do i need to check? 

internal display is fine. tapping <CHIP>U9600</CHIP> doesn't affect anything.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2330</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Noise on external monitor only
threads.message: Bad connector I guess. I wouldnt bother to fix this on such a pre historic machine, avoid.
